snippet: With hot, dry conditions continuing, officials said they did not expect to fully contain the fire for at least another week.
abstract: Wildfire in California's Angeles National Forest has consumed 3,600 acres; 800 firefighters are battling the blaze, and officials say they do not expect to fully contain it for at least a week.
lead_paragraph: With hot, dry conditions continuing, officials said they did not expect to fully contain the fire for at least another week.

headline.main: Nearly 800 Firefighters Battle Blaze in National Forest in Southern California
headline.print_headline: Nearly 800 Firefighters Battle Blaze in National Forest in Southern California
